concept.title: Unavailable Dimensions
concept.shortdesc: This section contains a list of dimensions that are not available to read or write using processing rules.

ul.li: Link Type, such as Custom, Download or Exit.
Hit type, such as page view, link click, video.
Custom tracked links do not contain a page URL, query string, or page name.
Object ID. This value used by ClickMap to uniquely identify a link.
Cookies cannot be access by processing rules directly. To use cookie data in a processing rule, you can read the value and store it in an attribute or context data variable.
Adding a serialization ID to an event (for example, setting an event to 1:abc123 to prevent recording the event twice).

Processing rules cannot read eVar values from the product list. eVars used by processing rules must be populated directly on the page (for example s.eVar1="news") or by using a processing rule earlier in the processing order.
